text: (Musrikon taqdir va qazoi ilohiro ʙahona karda xohand guft): «Agar Alloh mexost, mo va padaronamon musrik namesudem va cizero harom namekardem». Va Alloh ʙar onho rad karda suʙhai ononro ʙajon mekunad: Hamcunin kasone, ki pes az onho ʙudand, pajomʙaronro duruƣ ʙarovardand va xasmu azoʙi Moro casidand. Bigu (ej Rasul): «Agar sumoro donise hast, dar on ci harom sumorided az corpo va kistzor, pas onro ʙaroi mo oskor sozed. Vale sumo dar umuri din tanho az gumoni xes pajravi mekuned va ʙa cuz duruƣ cize namegued
